About Lily AI: Lily AI is a female-founded retail AI company empowering retailers and brands by bridging the gap between merchant-speak and customer-speak. Leveraging computer vision, natural language processing, machine learning, and vertical-specific large language models (LLMs), Lily AI enhances customer shopping experiences by injecting consumer-centric language throughout the retail technology ecosystem. Interoperable with leading eCommerce platforms, Lily AI maximizes existing tech investments to deliver upwards of 9-figure revenue lift through improved product attribution, enhanced discovery, and higher customer conversion. Learn more at www.lily.ai.Overview:We are seeking a highly motivated Principal Product Manager to join our team. As a Principal Product Manager, you will be responsible for driving the strategy and execution of core capabilities & UI/UX components that form the foundation of our AI platform, ensuring it meets customer needs and delivers business value. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to develop and execute on the product roadmap, defining requirements, prioritizing features, and delivering high-quality products that exceed customer expectations.In this role you will: Define the strategy and roadmap for our AI platform product, working closely with the engineering, design, sales, and marketing teams.
Conduct market and competitive analysis to identify customer needs and opportunities for growth.
Develop and prioritize product requirements, ensuring alignment with company goals and objectives.
Work with engineering to define and deliver high-quality products on time and within budget.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure product success, including sales, marketing, support, and customer success.
Partner with UX designers to create compelling and intuitive user experiences that meet customer needs.
Serve as the product expert, communicating the product vision, roadmap, and features to internal and external stakeholders.
Develop pricing strategies and business models that drive product growth and profitability.
Monitor and analyze product performance metrics to optimize product features and prioritize future development efforts. What we consider critical for the role: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field. MBA preferred.
8+ years of experience as a Product Manager Proven track record of successfully launching and scaling platform-based products.
Strong analytical skills, with the ability to synthesize complex data into actionable insights.
Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
Strong project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Must have strong backend experience. Front end experience is nice to have.
Passion for delivering high-quality products that exceed customer expectations.
Experience working in a startup or fast-paced environment in e-commerce space is preferred. Currently, we are hiring from the following states—(candidates must be in current residence or open to relocating):CaliforniaFloridaGeorgiaIllinoisMassachusettsMinnesotaNevada New JerseyNew YorkNorth CarolinaRhode IslandTennesseeTexas VirginiaWashingtonUtahCompensation:Compensation is competitive and will be determined based on a combination of experience, seniority, internal, external equity and location. For some context: this position in the US would pay between $177,000-$185,000 USD per year, depending on experience and seniority. In other regions, compensation will be adjusted for local currency and local market rates. Lily AI compensation policy is calculated with a focus on equity and where employees can thrive.
